definition: to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: You cannot use an external table in a sub-query
sentences.chinese: 不能在子查詢中使用一個外部表。

sentences.english: Based on randomizing techniques, this paper discussed how the sketch-based approach estimates approximate answers to aggregate queries.
sentences.chinese: 討論了基於草圖的複雜聚集查詢的近似處理算法。

sentences.english: The telephone operator who looks up telephong(telephone) numbers uses a computer.
sentences.chinese: 電話接線員使用電腦來查詢電話號碼。

sentences.english: Shows how to reduce the amount of data returned through a data service query.
sentences.chinese: 說明如何減少資料服務查詢所傳回的資料量。

sentences.english: So the next time I need it, I can look it up.
sentences.chinese: 所以下次我需要的時候，我就可以進行查詢。

sentences.english: How does the query specify the albums you want?
sentences.chinese: 那麼查詢又是如何指定所需的專輯呢？

sentences.english: With quickset label, easy to inquire about information.
sentences.chinese: 插條式標籤，便於資料查詢。

sentences.english: This will have an undesirable effect on query optimization.
sentences.chinese: 這對於查詢的優化有着不良的影響。

sentences.english: Please contact Concierge for details of Long Distance Car Hire.
sentences.chinese: 長途包車價格請向禮賓部查詢。

sentences.english: CQS puts commands and queries in different methods within a type.
sentences.chinese: CQS將命令和查詢作爲不同的方法放在一個類中。

sentences.english: The return value designates the slices on which the given query will be executed.
sentences.chinese: 返回值會指定給定查詢將要在其上執行的那些片。

sentences.english: Searching this data structure for query results will be performed in the main program logic.
sentences.chinese: 在主程序邏輯中執行數據結構搜索以獲得查詢結果。

sentences.english: Take the time to review multiple car types while you´re searching.
sentences.chinese: 在搜索時可花些時間查詢多種車型。

sentences.english: For this example, you need to add one query predicate for a relational column.
sentences.chinese: 對本例來說，您需要爲關係列添加一個查詢謂詞。

sentences.english: Steps for allowing the Query and View Designer to create a self-join.
sentences.chinese: 讓查詢和視圖設計器創建自聯接的步驟。

sentences.english: If you have any problem(s) filling in this form, please contact your account opening branch.
sentences.chinese: 如於填寫本表格時有任何疑問，請向開戶分行查詢。

definition: to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
to place an order/to book ahead
official website (abbr. for 官方網站|官方网站[guan1 fang1 wang3 zhan4])
email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
complaint/to complain/to register a complaint (esp. as a customer)
